titleStmt.title: The last warning to all the inhabitants of London.

notesStmt.note: Imprint from Wing, which has 1645/6 for publication date.
In favour of the Independents--Thomason Catalogue.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "20 March 1645". [i.e. 1646, according to Lady Day dating].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
